name: Pixel Trouble
description:
Pixel trouble - In this unusual platformer, you take on the role of a dim-witted knight who decided to become famous by accomplishing several feats. He chose the ghosts who fled from the cemetery as his goal, but here's the bad luck - the sword cannot injure the undead! There is nowhere to retreat, so break through the hordes of hostile spirits, collect useful things and strive to find a way out in this maze of deadly dangers!


Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack
